channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Media Are Doing Free PR for Accused Criminals Caught in ICE Raids
item.description: Many news reports on immigration-enforcement actions bury key information about apprehended individuals so deep that it’s next to dinosaur bones.

item.title: Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear teases 2028 Democratic White House bid ahead of South Carolina visit
item.description: Kentucky Gov. Andy Beshear is not shying from the prospect of running for the Democratic presidential nomination in 2028.

item.title: Russiagate Revisited: Trump CIA Chief Refers Brennan and Comey for Criminal Investigation
item.description: It’s well established that the Trump-Russia hoax was concocted to harm Trump, but Ratcliffe’s move is a prosecutorial dead end.

item.title: Key Senator: Trump’s DOJ, FBI Slow-Walking Assassination Attempt Investigations
item.description: Sen. Ron Johnson has issued a subpoena to FBI Director Kash Patel for the agency's records on the shooter and the shooting.

item.title: We Have to Save Childhood
item.description: The modern onslaught against childhood ought to inspire the rest of us to do what we can to preserve or reclaim its essential aspects.

item.title: From tariffs to universities, Trump's negotiating style is often less dealmaking and more coercion
item.description: President Donald Trump prides himself on being a dealmaker, but his negotiating style is more ultimatum than compromise.

item.title: An Enthralling Trip to Ancient Egypt
item.description: Mara, Daughter of the Nile is a thrilling summer read.

item.title: KBJ Keeps Showing America Why She Doesn’t Belong On SCOTUS
item.description: The more Jackson opens her mouth and pens unhinged opinions, the more clear it becomes she has no business being on SCOTUS.

item.title: ‘Two Different Americas’: SBA-Pro Life President Lays Out What’s Next In Fight For Life
item.description: Marjorie Dannenfelser laid out the movement's wins and losses post-Dobbs at the annual Iowa Family Leadership Summit in Des Moines.
